building.name: Lander Hab
building.description: The Lander Hab is a general purpose habitat for four persons. It serves as a jack-of-all-trades building that houses many basic but critical functions to jump start a settlement.

building.name: Inflatable Greenhouse
building.description: The Inflatable Greenhouse is a flexible structure made of interwoven layers of Kevlar and mylar around a flexible air bladder. It sufficiently retains an atmosphere for growing five crops and provides vital food source for settlers. It also houses one workbench with instruments for botany research.

building.name: MD1 Nuclear Reactor
building.description: The MD1 Nuclear Reactor is the first generation, small and self-contained 80kW nuclear reactor that is built for Martian environment and requires minimal maintenance.

building.name: Starting ERV Base
building.description: The starting ERV base was sent ahead of the arrival of the human crew and stores full tanks of hydrogen for settlement's use.

building.name: ERV Base
building.description: The Earth Return Vehicle (ERV) is a spacecraft structure with built-in Sabatier chemical reactor. The ERV base has already converted its initial load of hydrogen into carbon dioxide, water and oxygen.

building.name: MD4 Nuclear Reactor
building.description: The MD4 Nuclear Reactor is a medium-sized, self-contained 200kW Martian-reated nuclear reactor that requires minimal maintenance.

building.name: Atmospheric Processor
building.description: The Atmospheric Processor is an uninhabitable specialized building providing automatic water and air processing and recycling for the settlement

building.name: Residential Quarters
building.description: The Residential Quarters is the first specialized living accommodation building that is configurable with enough space to house as many as 12 beds.

building.name: Lounge
building.description: The Lounge is a rest and relaxation living space furnished with dining tables and chairs for serving almost three dozens of people at a time. It has a well furnished kitchen supporting a lot of food processing activities and plenty of resource storage space. It also has a small gym room with exercise equipment.

building.name: Infirmary
building.description: The Infirmary is the first medical facility equipped to provide more adequate medical care for settlers. It houses one workbench with equipment for medical research.

building.name: Command and Control
building.description: The Command and Control is a communication facility with networking capability for high speed communications, central EVA operations and colony-width connectivity.

building.name: Large Greenhouse
building.description: The Large Greenhouse is furnished with a botany research lab with instruments. It has a spacious interior for high volume crop cultivation and has a high resource storage capability

building.name: Laboratory
building.description: The Laboratory is a modest facility furnished with workbench, instruments, computers and tablets and peer collaboration communication suites of equipment that enables making scientific inquiries on the froniter of Mars.

building.name: Garage
building.description: The Garage is an enclosed maintenance facility for building, repairing and modifying Martian rovers and vehicles

building.name: Workshop
building.description: The Workshop is a manufacturing building furnished with computerized machinaries for processing resources, snythesizing parts and assembling items for settlement's use.

building.name: Methane Power Generator
building.description: The Methane Power generator utilized methane gas for the generation of electricity. It makes use of the freely available carbon dioxide in the Martian atmosphere and creates non-polluting by-products.

building.name: Wind Turbine
building.description: The Wind Turbine power generator provides a completely non-polluting form of renewable energy. Asides from the typical maintenance tasks, it is an integral part of a modular distributed renewable energy generation system complimenting the nuclear power generators for the power grid.

building.name: Solar Photovoltaic Array
building.description: The Solar Photovoltaic Array is an array of steerable photovoltaic panels that generates electricity from Martian sunlight. It is an essential part of a modular distributed renewable energy generation system for the power grid.

building.name: Solar Thermal Array
building.description: The Solar Thermal Array is an array of steerable parabolic reflectors that concentrates sunlight for heating up molten materials that move mechanical turbines generating power.

building.name: Small Areothermal Well
building.description: The Small Areothermal Well is an geothermal energy production system that captures the trapped underground heat for the power grid.

building.name: Large Areothermal Well
building.description: The Large Areothermal Well is an geothermal energy production system that features more advance geothermal flow path for ground loop design for capturing heat and creating electricity.

building.name: Concrete Storage Bin
building.description: The Concrete Storage Bin is a small brick bin for storing dry concrete material for light contruction project.

building.name: Cement Storage Bin
building.description: The Cement Storage Bin is a small brick bin for storing dry cement for light contruction project.

building.name: Mortar Storage Bin
building.description: The Mortar Storage Bin is a small brick bin for storing dry mortar for light contruction project.

building.name: Lime Storage Bin
building.description: The Lime Storage Bin is a small brick bin for storing lime for light contruction project.

building.name: Carbon Storage Bin
building.description: The Carbon Storage Bin is a small brick bin for storing carbon for light contruction project.

building.name: Regolith Storage Bin
building.description: The Regolith Storage Bin is a small brick bin for storing Martian regolith for light contruction project.

building.name: Sand Storage Bin
building.description: The Sand Storage Bin is a small brick bin for storing Martian sand for light contruction project.

building.name: Ice Storage Bin
building.description: The Ice Storage Bin is a small brick bin for handling and storing extracted ice for future use.

building.name: Manufacturing Shed
building.description: The Manufacturing Shed is a small brick manufacturing building for forming, cutting, coating and glazing bricks for construction projects.

building.name: Bunkhouse
building.description: The Bunkhouse is a spartan living quarters with two beds. It is a retractable housing custom-tailored for temporary mining outpost operation.

building.name: Small Sabatier Processor
building.description: The Small Sabatier Processor is a small building housing a sabatier system that features the reaction hydrogen with carbon dioxide at elevated temperatures and pressures in the presence of a nickel catalyst to produce methane and water

building.name: Small Battery Array
building.description: The Small Battery Array showcased an advanced battery system that stored excess power during non-peak hours and released power during peak power usage. Array of rover batteries

building.name: Astronomy Observatory
building.description: The Astronomy Observatory is a small self-contained observatory building furnished with an optical telescope, research workbench and astronomy laboratory as well as a built-in EVA airlock for ingress and egress.

building.name: Storage Hab
building.description: The Storage Hab is a Lander Hab refitted storage building with ample storage space. It has built-in PV panels as backup power source.

building.name: Research Hab
building.description: The Research Hab is a Lander Hab refitted laboratory building for scientific research. It can be custom-tailored with computer systems for up to four research subjects and has built-in solar panels.

building.name: Residential Hab
building.description: The Residential Hab is a Lander Hab refitted residential quarters for living accommodation of up to 8 persons. It uses solar panels as backup power source.

building.name: Medical Hab
building.description: The Medical Hab is a Lander Hab refitted medical facility for providing medical basic care. It also has medical research workbench and uses solar panels as backup power source.

building.name: Machinery Hab
building.description: The Machinery Hab is a Lander Hab refitted manufacturing workshop for making items and synthesizing resource. It provides storage space for housing commonly used resources.

building.name: Outpost Hub
building.description: The Outpost Hub is a vaulted brick building that acts as the main hub of a trading or mining outpost. Like its cousin Lander Hab, it hosts a suite of functions to its inhabitants.

building.name: Storage Shed
building.description: The Storage Shed is a small brick building for storing resources for the settlement.

building.name: Loading Dock Garage
building.description: The Loading Dock Garage is an enclosed maintenance facility featuring a brick loading dock for easy access. It has equipment for building, repairing and modifying rovers and vehicles.

building.name: Mining Lab
building.description: The Mining Lab is a small brick laboratory furnished for mining-related scientific instruments and research workbench.

building.name: Inground Greenhouse
building.description: The Inground Greenhouse is a semi underground structure with a vaulted flber glass roof which is less suceptible to meteor damage. It grows crops as food for the settlement.

building.name: Hallway
building.description: The Hallway is a pressurized access tube connecting two inhabitable buildings. It allows only one person to access it at a time.

building.name: Tunnel
building.description: The Tunnel is an underground pressurized access tube connecting two inhabitable buildings. It allows only one person to access it at a time.
